page.title: 18COMMUNICATIONS TO NENTHEAD
page.content: Nenthead has a good postal service with collections twice daily. The postman here travel in Land Rovers as some places have difficult access and of course they are more suited to the severe weather conditions. Most houses have a private phone, but there is one public phone outside the Post Office. Regional Television news and programmes are provided by Border based in Carlisle and Tyne Tees based in Newcastle. Local radio is Radio Carlisle. Local news is found in the Hexham Courant, The Cumberland News and The Cumberland & Westmorland Herald. The locally produced Alston Advertiser closed down this year having run only for two years.
